trans-unit.resname: PH18·1 | Kharis & The Beholder | Card Name
PH18·1 | Kharis & The Beholder | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying When Kharis & The Beholder enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 white Human creature token and make a charisma check. (Roll a d20.) • If the result plus the number of creatures you control is greater than 11, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. • If the result is a natural 20, for each nonlegendary creature you control, create a token that's a copy of that creature.
trans-unit.target: Flying When Kharis & The Beholder enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 white Human creature token and make a charisma check. (Roll a d20.) • If the result plus the number of creatures you control is greater than 11, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. • If the result is a natural 20, for each nonlegendary creature you control, create a token that's a copy of that creature.

PH18·2 | Optimus Prime, Inspiring Leader | Card Name
PH18·2 | Optimus Prime, Inspiring Leader | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {1}: Turn target permanent you control to its other face. {1}: Until end of turn, Optimus Prime, Inspiring Leader becomes a Construct with base power and toughness 6/6 and creatures you control gain trample.
trans-unit.target: {1}: Turn target permanent you control to its other face. {1}: Until end of turn, Optimus Prime, Inspiring Leader becomes a Construct with base power and toughness 6/6 and creatures you control gain trample.

PH18·3 | Sol, Advocate Eternal | Card Name
PH18·3 | Sol, Advocate Eternal | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Legendary partner (You can have two commanders if this is one of them. The other one is promoted to legendary.) Flying, vigilance Teamwork — Whenever you attack or block with both Sol, Advocate Eternal and its partner, support 4 and investigate four times.
trans-unit.target: Legendary partner (You can have two commanders if this is one of them. The other one is promoted to legendary.) Flying, vigilance Teamwork — Whenever you attack or block with both Sol, Advocate Eternal and its partner, support 4 and investigate four times.

trans-unit.resname: PH18·3 | Sol, Advocate Eternal | Flavor Text
PH18·4 | The Legend of Arena | Card Name
PH18·4 | The Legend of Arena | Card Text
trans-unit.source: The Legend of Arena can be your commander. I, II — Create a 2/1 red Human Wizard creature token. Spells you cast this turn cost {1} less to cast for each Wizard you control. III — Search your library for a planeswalker card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. It enters with an additional loyalty counter on it for each Wizard you control.
trans-unit.target: The Legend of Arena can be your commander. I, II — Create a 2/1 red Human Wizard creature token. Spells you cast this turn cost {1} less to cast for each Wizard you control. III — Search your library for a planeswalker card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. It enters with an additional loyalty counter on it for each Wizard you control.
